pinyin: man4 xing4 zu3 se4 xing4 fei4 bing4

definition: silicosis (occupational disease of miners)/grinder's disease/also written 矽末病
pneumoconiosis (occupational disease of coal miners)/silicosis/also written 矽肺病

sentences.english: ObjectiveObserve the curative effect of Chinese drugs on chronic obstructive lung disease in alleviating period.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察中藥治療慢性阻塞性肺病緩解期的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: What is chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD)?
sentences.chinese: 什麼是慢性阻塞性肺病？

sentences.english: Refer patient to a pulmonologist for further care.
sentences.chinese: 把病人送到肺病專家處做進一步治療。

sentences.english: Coal miners can get black lung disease.
sentences.chinese: 煤礦工人很可能得黑肺病。

sentences.english: People with chronic lung diseases fight for air while doing simple tasks.
sentences.chinese: 慢性肺病患者在從事簡單勞動的時候都需要竭力呼吸。

sentences.english: But I'll take TMI over black lungs any day.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我寧願發短信發到手軟，也不願染上黑肺病。

sentences.english: ObjectiveIn our country, silicosis is the most serious vocational diseases that is harmful to workers.
sentences.chinese: 目的在我國，矽肺病是危害工人健康最嚴重的職業病。

sentences.english: Objective To study dynamic change of pneumoconiosis cases in a nonferrous metal company over 50 years.
sentences.chinese: 探討某有色金屬公司50年來塵肺病發病的動態變化。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical outcomes of whole lung lavage for the therapy of pneumoconiosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討全肺灌洗術塵肺病的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: Authoritative does the hospital have name of hospital of good improvement ground and address to silicosis disease?
sentences.chinese: 有權威的醫院對矽肺病有良好改善地醫院名和地址嗎？

sentences.english: He. Mr. He learned he had silicosis in 2004.
sentences.chinese: 何全貴在2004年得知自己患上了矽肺病。

sentences.english: So the key to control is to prevent.
sentences.chinese: 因此，控制塵肺病的關鍵是預防。

sentences.english: The smoker has been labouring under lung disease for many years.
sentences.chinese: 吸菸者多年來一直爲肺病所苦。

sentences.english: Most of them were older persons with heart and lung problems.
sentences.chinese: 死者中絕大大都都是患有心臟病和肺病的白叟。

sentences.english: Winter also had become acquainted with a Chinese poet-scholar Wen Yi-to, in the United States for treatment of a lung ailment .
sentences.chinese: 溫德還結識了到美國來治肺病的中國詩人學者聞一多。

definition: bacterial tracheitis (inflammation of the windpipe, often caused by Staphylococcus aureus)/henpecked (a pun on 妻子管得严 used in comic theater)
to contract (an illness)/to be afflicted with/to suffer from
